title: Calc Genius
description: A generic calculation engine to consume data and apply custom formulas.

errors.masterOnlyDescription: This module is for global configuration and can only be accessed in the 'Master' context.

toasts.permissionDenied: You do not have permission to perform this action.

validation.idMin: ID must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.idRegex: ID must only contain lowercase letters and underscores.
validation.nameMin: Group name must be at least 3 characters.
validation.slugRegex: Slug must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, hyphens, and underscores.
validation.slugInUse: This slug is already in use. Please choose another one.

zod.idInUse: This ID is already in use.
zod.fieldIdInUse: This Field ID is already in use.
zod.formulaIdInUse: This Formula ID is already in use.

groupsTab.title: Manage Groups
groupsTab.description: Create, edit, sort, and customize the groupers for your fields and formulas.

dialog.description: Set the properties for your menu group.

slug.label: ID (Slug)
slug.description: Unique identifier. Cannot be changed after creation.

applyColorTo.label: Color Application
applyColorTo.description: Defines where the custom color will be applied.

unifiedColor.label: Use same color for icon and text?
unifiedColor.description: Applies a single color to both the icon and the text.

styleSuggestion.nameRequired: Please enter a name with at least 3 characters.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Deletion
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete the group "{groupName}"? Fields associated with this group will become ungrouped.

toasts.deleteSuccessDescription: The group has been successfully removed.

fieldsTab.title: Manage Fields
fieldsTab.description: Create, edit, and organize the fields that will serve as the basis for calculations.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Action
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete {count, plural, one {this field} other {# fields}}?

formulasTab.title: Calculation Formulas
formulasTab.description: Create and manage the expressions that transform your fields into results.

table.emptyState: No formulas match the current filters.

deleteDialog.title: Confirm Deletion
deleteDialog.description_single: Are you sure you want to delete the formula "{formulaName}"?
deleteDialog.description: Are you sure you want to delete {count, plural, one {this formula} other {# formulas}}?

id.label: Field ID (for formulas)
id.description: Unique ID. Auto-generated from the label.

mainGroup.label: Main Group (for icon)
mainGroup.description: Select a main group if you have chosen more than one.

editableByUser.label: Editable by User?
editableByUser.description: Allows the end-user to change this value during simulation.

analyzerTab.title: File Analyzer
analyzerTab.description: Upload an XML, JSON, CSV, or XLSX file to inspect its fields and structure.
analyzerTab.analysisDescription: Processing the file in the background.

errors.invalidFileTypeDescription: Please select a valid Excel file (.xlsx or .xls).

testsTab.title: Testing Environment
testsTab.description: Select fields, enter values, and simulate the calculations of your formulas.
testsTab.explanation: This section is under construction and will allow you to test your entire calculation engine.
